dmca.title: Wolfgang's Vault wants recordings off blogs
dmca.body:
Thank you for your prompt attention to our fax yesterday. Upon further examination the blogger we notified you about has four other postings that feature copyrighted works owned by us. We insist that you remove this from your site immediately.

1. The copyrighted works at issue are concert audio recordings for three bands; The Jimi Hendrix Experience, Derek & The Dominos, and Jefferson Airplane. These concerts appear on our website at the following URLs:
http://concerts.wolfgangsvault.com/ConcertDetail.aspx?id58219960 
http://concerts.wolfgangsvault.com/ConcertDetail.aspx?id49998j9960 
http://concerts.wolfgangsvault.com/ConcertDetail.aspx?id5O565j1787 
http://concerts.wolfgangsvault.com/ConcertDetail.aspx?id12313230 

2. Audio recordings for these have both been posted at the following URLs: 
http://musictravellers.blogspot.com/2007/03/jimi-hendrix-1968-complete-winterland.html
http://musictravellers.blogspot.com/2007/01/derek-dominos-1970-10-23-new-york.html
http://musictravellers.blogspot.com/2007/01/derek-dominos-1970-10-24-new-york.html
http://musictravellers.blogspot.com/2007/01/jefferson-airplane-1966-soundboards.html
 
3. You can reach me at: 
[private]
Wolfgang
